section.name: Unit 3. Effective Strategies for Teaching Adult English Learners
section.summary:
Welcome to Unit 3: Effective Strategies for Teaching Adult English Learners. ​ In this unit, we will explore effective instructional approaches and strategies for working with adult ELs. We will see how to create lessons that promote the development of adult ELs’ communicative competence using listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. ​

To get started, download the Handouts for use in Unit 3.

To complete the unit, view the video for Unit 3 and then complete the three-question knowledge check.
